text: right Rodolfo Gustavo da Paixão (13 July 1853 - 18 November 1925) was a Brazilian marshal and politician, who served as the Governor of the state of Goiás twice, February 1890 to January 1891, and again July to December 1891. He was decorated with the Knight of the Military Order of Avis and Gold Military Medal.Alzira Alves de Abreu ( 2015 ). «PAIXÃO, Rodolfo Gustavo da» (PDF) . Historical-biographical dictionary of the First Republic (1889-1930), Getulio Vargas FoundationDiary of the National Congress» (PDF) . Of 16 July of 1953 , page 16«Rodolpho Paixão» (PDF) .
